ValidationRule.description: You cannot move the opportunity backwards from Ready to Ship or Closed Won. Only Finance, Operations and Admins can move orders past the stage of Closing.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Revenue Opportunity")), ( NOT(PRIORVALUE(Probability)=0)), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Incubate"), NOT(OR( ($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), ($Profile.Name="Order Operations Admin"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Industrial"), CONTAINS( Owner.Title ,"Renewal") ) ))
